show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: UPAnd DownOn Wall Street
content:
An analysis of the way in which you have – quite literally and without any exaggeration whatsoever – been robbed by the... <!--more--> Fed… and how they have given your money away to the big-money interests.
The Fed is now, itself, leveraged at 72-to-1, a gamble quite on a par with anything you might find in Las Vegas.
Those banks then loan YOUR money back to YOU at 16% interest.
The stock market remains valued at nearly double its historical norms.
Sentiment remains wildly bullish with 55% bulls to 19% bears, record margin debt, heavy IPO issuance and record “covenant lite” debt issuance.
Wall Street analysts lie about current earnings, profit margins and price/earnings multiples.
The Feds have been seizing money from children for old debts of their parents.
China’s credit bubble is about to pop as developers of entirely empty, whole cities fail to provide them with income to service their debts.
French employees may not consult their work-related communications technology after 6 pm until they get to work the following morning.
The new ‘subprime’ (for cars).
Economists are warning that the eurozone debt crisis will shortly erupt on a large scale.
Bridgewater believes 85% of pension funds are going to fail.
Finally, the annual Stella Awards for the most outlandish lawsuits and verdicts in the US
